00009 bool bundler_driver(
00010     const bundler_routines &routines,
00011     const vcl_vector<vil_image_resource_sptr> &imageset,
00012     const vcl_vector<double> &exif_tags,
00013 
00014     vcl_vector<vpgl_perspective_camera<double> > &cameras,
00015     vcl_vector<vgl_point_3d<double> > &points,
00016     vnl_sparse_matrix<bool> &visibility_graph)
00017 {
00018     bundler_inters_reconstruction recon;
00019 
00020     routines.features_phase.run_feature_stage(
00021         imageset, exif_tags, recon);
00022 
00023     return routines.sfm_phase.run_sfm_stage(
00024         recon, cameras, points, visibility_graph);
00025 }

00029 bool bundler_write_ply_file(
00030     const char* filename,
00031     const vcl_vector<vgl_point_3d<double> > &points)
00032 {
00033     vcl_ofstream ply;
00034     ply.open(filename);
00035 
00036     if ( !ply.is_open() ) {
00037         return false;
00038     }
00039 
00040     // Write the header. According to the standard, the endline
00041     // character is "\n", not anything else, so use "\n", not vcl_endl
00042     ply << "ply\n"
00043         << "format ascii 1.0\n"
00044         << "element face 0\n"
00045         << "property list uchar int vertex_indices\n"
00046         << "element vertex " << points.size() << '\n'
00047         << "property float x\n"
00048         << "property float y\n"
00049         << "property float z\n"
00050         << "end_header\n";
00051 
00052     vcl_vector<vgl_point_3d<double> >::const_iterator i;
00053     for (i = points.begin(); i != points.end(); i++) {
00054         ply << i->x() << ' '
00055             << i->y() << ' '
00056             << i->z() << '\n';
00057     }
00058     ply.close();
00059     return true;
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 bool bundler_write_bundle_file(
00064     const char* filename,
00065     const vcl_vector<vpgl_perspective_camera<double> > &cameras,
00066     const vcl_vector<vgl_point_3d<double> > &points)
00067 {
00068     vcl_ofstream bundle_file;
00069     bundle_file.open(filename);
00070 
00071     if ( !bundle_file.is_open() ) {
00072         return false;
00073     }
00074 
00075     // Write the header
00076     int num_cameras = cameras.size();
00077     int num_points = points.size();
00078     
00079     bundle_file << "# Bundle file v0.3\n"
00080                 << num_cameras << " " << num_points << "\n";
00081 
00082     vcl_vector<vpgl_perspective_camera<double> >::const_iterator c;
00083     for (c = cameras.begin(); c != cameras.end(); c++) {
00084         /* Intrinsics */
00085         const vpgl_calibration_matrix<double> &K = c->get_calibration();
00086         const vnl_matrix_fixed<double,3,3> &R = c->get_rotation().as_matrix();
00087         const vgl_vector_3d<double> &t = c->get_translation();
00088 
00089         bundle_file << K.focal_length() << " " << 0 << " " << 0 << "\n";
00090         bundle_file << R;
00091         bundle_file << t.x() << " " << t.y() << " " << t.z() << "\n";
00092     }
00093 
00094     vcl_vector<vgl_point_3d<double> >::const_iterator p;
00095     for (p = points.begin(); p != points.end(); p++) {
00096         bundle_file << p->x() << ' ' << p->y() << ' ' << p->z() << '\n';
00097         bundle_file << 0 << ' ' << 0 << ' ' << 255 << '\n';
00098         bundle_file << 0 << '\n';
00099     }
00100 
00101     bundle_file.close();
00102     return true;
00103 }

00107 bundler_tracks::bundler_tracks():manage_pointers(true)
00108 {

00110         new bundler_tracks_impl_detect_sift;

00113         new bundler_tracks_impl_propose_matches_all;

00116         new bundler_tracks_impl_match_ann;

00119         new bundler_tracks_impl_refine_epipolar;

00135             s.propose_matches_settings);

00138         new bundler_tracks_impl_match_ann(
00139             s.match_settings);

00150 
00151 void bundler_tracks::run_feature_stage(
00152     const vcl_vector<vil_image_resource_sptr> &imageset,
00153     const vcl_vector<double> &focal_lengths,
00154     bundler_inters_reconstruction &empty_recon) const
00155 {
00156     assert(imageset.size() == focal_lengths.size());
00157 
00158     // First, run the detect stage.
00159     vcl_vector<vil_image_resource_sptr>::const_iterator img_i;
00160     vcl_vector<double>::const_iterator exif_i;
00161     for (img_i = imageset.begin(), exif_i = focal_lengths.begin();
00162          img_i != imageset.end(); img_i++, exif_i++)
00163     {
00164         vcl_cout<<"Detecting features " << (img_i - imageset.begin()) + 1
00165                 << '/' << imageset.size() << vcl_endl;
00166 
00167         empty_recon.feature_sets.push_back(
00168             (*detect_features)(*img_i, *exif_i));
00169     }
00170 
00171     // Now get the match lists.
00172     vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_pair> matches;
00173 
00174     (*propose_matches)(empty_recon.feature_sets, matches);
00175 
00176     // For every proposed match, run the match stage.
00177     vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_pair>::const_iterator j;
00178     for (j = matches.begin(); j != matches.end(); j++) {
00179         bundler_inters_match_set match_set;
00180 
00181         vcl_cout<<"Matching features " << (j - matches.begin()) + 1
00182                 << '/' << matches.size() << vcl_endl;
00183 
00184         (*match)(*j, match_set);
00185         (*refine)(match_set);
00186 
00187         if (match_set.num_features() > 0) {
00188             empty_recon.match_sets.push_back(match_set);
00189         }
00190     }
00191 
00192     // Finally, chain everything into a track
00193     (*chain_matches)(
00194         empty_recon.match_sets,
00195         empty_recon.feature_sets,
00196         empty_recon.tracks);
00197 
00198     // Clear the visited tags for every feature.
00199     vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr>::const_iterator i;
00200     for (i = empty_recon.feature_sets.begin();
00201          i != empty_recon.feature_sets.end(); i++)
00202     {
00203         vcl_vector<bundler_inters_feature_sptr>::iterator j;
00204         for (j = (*i)->features.begin(); j != (*i)->features.end(); j++) {
00205             (*j)->visited = false;
00206         }
00207     }
00208 }

00222         new bundler_sfm_impl_add_next_images();

00225         new bundler_sfm_impl_add_new_points();

00245             s.add_next_images_settings);

00256 
00257 bool bundler_sfm::run_sfm_stage(
00258         bundler_inters_reconstruction &recon,
00259         vcl_vector<vpgl_perspective_camera<double> > &cameras,
00260         vcl_vector<vgl_point_3d<double> > &points,
00261         vnl_sparse_matrix<bool> visibility_matrix) const
00262 {
00263     assert(cameras.size() == 0);
00264     assert(points.size() == 0);
00265 
00266     //Create the initial reconstruction
00267     vcl_cout << "Creating the initial reconstruction..." << vcl_endl;
00268 
00269     if ( ! (*create_initial_recon)(recon) ){
00270         return false;
00271     }
00272 
00273     vcl_cout << "Bundle adjusting initial reconstruction..." << vcl_endl;
00274     (*bundle_adjust)(recon);
00275 
00276     {
00277         /* Write initial reconstruction to a file */
00278         vcl_vector<vpgl_perspective_camera<double> > cameras_init;
00279 
00280         vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr>::const_iterator cam;
00281         for (cam = recon.feature_sets.begin(); cam != recon.feature_sets.end(); ++cam) {
00282             if ( (*cam)->in_recon ){
00283                 cameras_init.push_back((*cam)->camera);
00284             }
00285         }
00286         
00287         vcl_vector<vgl_point_3d<double> > points_init;
00288 
00289         vcl_vector<bundler_inters_track_sptr>::const_iterator pt;
00290         for (pt = recon.tracks.begin(); pt != recon.tracks.end(); pt++) {
00291             if ( (*pt)->observed ) {
00292                 points_init.push_back((*pt)->world_point);
00293             }
00294         }
00295 
00296         bundler_write_ply_file("points_init.ply", points_init);
00297         bundler_write_bundle_file("bundle_init.out", cameras_init, points_init);
00298     }
00299 
00300     //Now do the add images, add points, bundle adjust loop
00301     vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> to_add;
00302     while ( (*select_next_images)(recon, to_add) ) {
00303         vcl_cout << vcl_endl;
00304 
00305         vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr> added;
00306 
00307         vcl_cout << "Adding next set of images..." << vcl_endl;
00308         (*add_next_images)(to_add, recon, added);
00309 
00310         assert(to_add.size() > 0);
00311 
00312         vcl_cout << "Bundle adjusting [after adding images]..." << vcl_endl;
00313         (*bundle_adjust)(recon);
00314 
00315         vcl_cout << "Adding new points..." << vcl_endl;
00316         (*add_new_points)(recon, added);
00317 
00318         vcl_cout << "Bundle adjusting [after adding points]..." << vcl_endl;
00319         (*bundle_adjust)(recon);
00320 
00321         to_add.clear();
00322     }
00323 
00324     //Now get the information from the reconstruction struct.
00325     vcl_vector<bundler_inters_image_sptr>::const_iterator cam;
00326     for (cam = recon.feature_sets.begin();
00327          cam != recon.feature_sets.end();
00328          ++cam)
00329     {
00330         if ( (*cam)->in_recon ){
00331             cameras.push_back((*cam)->camera);
00332         }
00333     }
00334 
00335     vcl_vector<bundler_inters_track_sptr>::const_iterator pt;
00336     for (pt = recon.tracks.begin(); pt != recon.tracks.end(); pt++) {
00337         if ( (*pt)->observed ) {
00338             points.push_back((*pt)->world_point);
00339         }
00340     }
00341 
00342     visibility_matrix = recon.visibility_matrix;
00343 
00344     return true;
00345 }
